quote: A nation that is afraid to let its people judge the truth and falsehood in an open market is a nation that is afraid of its people.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Pick the day. Enjoy it - to the hilt. The day as it comes. People as they come... The past, I think, has helped me appreciate the present - and I don't want to spoil any of it by fretting about the future.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: We fear violence less than our own feelings. Personal, private, solitary pain is more terrifying than what anyone else can inflict.
name: Jim Morrison

quote: What is needed, rather than running away or controlling or suppressing or any other resistance, is understanding fear that means, watch it, learn about it, come directly into contact with it. We are to learn about fear, not how to escape from it.
name: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear knowing what must be done does away with fear.
name: Rosa Parks

quote: We should not fret for what is past, nor should we be anxious about the future men of discernment deal only with the present moment.
name: Chanakya

quote: It is the strange fate of man, that even in the greatest of evils the fear of the worst continues to haunt him.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Love is what we were born with. Fear is what we learned here.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: The first duty of man is to conquer fear he must get rid of it, he cannot act till then.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: A person's fears are lighter when the danger is at hand.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Fear stifles our thinking and actions. It creates indecisiveness that results in stagnation. I have known talented people who procrastinate indefinitely rather than risk failure. Lost opportunities cause erosion of confidence, and the downward spiral begins.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: I have never known any distress that an hour's reading did not relieve.
name: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: True nobility is exempt from fear.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Fear makes us feel our humanity.

quote: There are many victories worse than a defeat.
name: George Eliot

quote: Fear is static that prevents me from hearing myself.

quote: One had to take some action against fear when once it laid hold of one.

quote: Prosperity is not without many fears and distastes adversity not without many comforts and hopes.

quote: There is no passion so contagious as that of fear.

quote: He that hopes no good fears no ill.

quote: That man is prudent who neither hopes nor fears anything from the uncertain events of the future.

quote: To him who is in fear everything rustles.

quote: There are very few monsters who warrant the fear we have of them.

quote: We often pretend to fear what we really despise, and more often despise what we really fear.

quote: We have perhaps a natural fear of ends. We would rather be always on the way than arrive. Given the means, we hang on to them and often forget the ends.

quote: I fear the Greeks, even when they bring gifts.

quote: The thinner the ice, the more anxious is everyone to see whether it will bear.

quote: The fear of becoming a 'has-been' keeps some people from becoming anything.

quote: Everyone wishes that the man whom he fears would perish.

quote: Minds that are ill at ease are agitated by both hope and fear.

quote: I'd rather give my life than be afraid to give it.

quote: As a child, I was more afraid of tetanus shots than, for example, Dracula.

quote: To pity distress is but human to relieve it is Godlike.

quote: My 'fear' is my substance, and probably the best part of me.

quote: We fear things in proportion to our ignorance of them.

quote: Every man, through fear, mugs his aspirations a dozen times a day.

quote: Some movie stars wear their sunglasses even in church. They're afraid God might recognize them and ask for autographs.

quote: He whom many fear, has himself many to fear.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: Fear has many eyes and can see things underground.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: There is no hope unmingled with fear, and no fear unmingled with hope.

quote: There is nothing that fear and hope does not permit men to do.
name: Luc de Clapiers

quote: I have a fear of being boring.

quote: I'm not at the point where I'd feel safe in a house alone. I would be really scared. I'm the kind of person that when I get up to go use the bathroom I have this big long hallway, and I just know someone's going to jump out and get me.

quote: This is all you have. This is not a dry run. This is your life. If you want to fritter it away with your fears, then you will fritter it away, but you won't get it back later.

quote: Hate is the consequence of fear we fear something before we hate it a child who fears noises becomes a man who hates noise.
name: Cyril Connolly

quote: Do what you fear and fear disappears.

quote: Slowness to change usually means fear of the new.

quote: By adversity are wrought the greatest works of admiration, and all the fair examples of renown, out of distress and misery are grown.

quote: Nothing gives a fearful man more courage than another's fear.

quote: Great work is done by people who are not afraid to be great.

quote: We fear the thing we want the most.
name: Robert Anthony

quote: It is the perpetual dread of fear, the fear of fear, that shapes the face of a brave man.

quote: An ugly sight, a man who is afraid.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: Ultimately we know deeply that the other side of every fear is freedom.
name: Marilyn Ferguson

quote: Let the fear of danger be a spur to prevent it he that fears not, gives advantage to the danger.
name: Francis Quarles

quote: Courage is never to let your actions be influenced by your fears.

quote: We should not be afraid to go into a new era, to leave the old beyond.

quote: Courage is a peculiar kind of fear.

quote: Only when we are no longer afraid do we begin to live.

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good for the great.

quote: True success is overcoming the fear of being unsuccessful.

quote: One thing about being successful is that I stopped being afraid of dying. Once you're a star you're dead already. You're embalmed.

quote: The mark of fear is not easily removed.

quote: What we have most to fear is failure of the heart.

quote: Fear tastes like a rusty knife and do not let her into your house.
name: John Cheever

quote: Fear is excitement without breath.

quote: I hasten to laugh at everything, for fear of being obliged to weep.

quote: A child understands fear, and the hurt and hate it brings.

quote: To fight fear, act. To increase fear - wait, put off postpone.

quote: Show me a guy who's afraid to look bad, and I'll show you a guy you can beat every time.

quote: No good work is ever done while the heart is hot and anxious and fretted.

quote: We consume our tomorrows fretting about our yesterdays.

quote: I think what weakens people most is fear of wasting their strength.

quote: If you let your fear of consequence prevent you from following your deepest instinct, your life will be safe, expedient and thin.

quote: When the people fear the government, there is tyranny. When the government fears the people, there is liberty.

quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.'
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.

quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.

quote: Expose yourself to your deepest fear after that, fear has no power, and the fear of freedom shrinks and vanishes. You are free.

quote: The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed.
name: Buddha

quote: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.

quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: People fear death even more than pain. It's strange that they fear death. Life hurts a lot more than death. At the point of death, the pain is over. Yeah, I guess it is a friend.

quote: It was the experience of mystery - even if mixed with fear - that engendered religion.

quote: When one has the feeling of dislike for evil, when one feels tranquil, one finds pleasure in listening to good teachings when one has these feelings and appreciates them, one is free of fear.

quote: Question with boldness even the existence of a God because, if there be one, he must more approve of the homage of reason, than that of blind-folded fear.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Do the thing you fear most and the death of fear is certain.

quote: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.

quote: Fix reason firmly in her seat, and call to her tribunal every fact, every opinion. Question with boldness even the existence of a God because, if there be one, he must more approve of the homage of reason, than that of blindfolded fear.

quote: Don't let the fear of striking out hold you back.

quote: Action is a great restorer and builder of confidence. Inaction is not only the result, but the cause, of fear. Perhaps the action you take will be successful perhaps different action or adjustments will have to follow. But any action is better than no action at all.

quote: Advance, and never halt, for advancing is perfection. Advance and do not fear the thorns in the path, for they draw only corrupt blood.

quote: There is not a truth existing which I fear... or would wish unknown to the whole world.

quote: In time we hate that which we often fear.

quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.

quote: Tell your heart that the fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself. And no heart has ever suffered when it goes in search of its dream.

quote: Only he can take great resolves who has indomitable faith in God and has fear of God.

quote: Fear is pain arising from the anticipation of evil.

quote: When I hear music, I fear no danger. I am invulnerable. I see no foe. I am related to the earliest times, and to the latest.

quote: When your time comes to die, be not like those whose hearts are filled with fear of death, so that when their time comes they weep and pray for a little more time to live their lives over again in a different way. Sing your death song, and die like a hero going home.

quote: Fear is the mother of morality.

quote: Nothing is more despicable than respect based on fear.

quote: Limits, like fear, is often an illusion.

quote: The appeal of cinema lies in the fear of death.

quote: The generality of men are naturally apt to be swayed by fear rather than reverence, and to refrain from evil rather because of the punishment that it brings than because of its own foulness.

quote: When even one American - who has done nothing wrong - is forced by fear to shut his mind and close his mouth - then all Americans are in peril.

quote: Simulated disorder postulates perfect discipline simulated fear postulates courage simulated weakness postulates strength.

quote: Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.

quote: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty. All other pacts of love or fear derive from it and are modeled upon it.

name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I never dared to be radical when young for fear it would make me conservative when old.

quote: The time to take counsel of your fears is before you make an important battle decision. That's the time to listen to every fear you can imagine! When you have collected all the facts and fears and made your decision, turn off all your fears and go ahead!

quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
name: James A. Baldwin

quote: Where there is reverence there is fear, but there is not reverence everywhere that there is fear, because fear presumably has a wider extension than reverence.

quote: You are going to let the fear of poverty govern you life and your reward will be that you will eat, but you will not live.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: On every front there are clear answers out there that can make this country stronger, but we're going to break through the fear and the frustration people are feeling. Our job is to make sure that even as we make progress, that we are also giving people a sense of hope and vision for the future.
name: Barack Obama

quote: I believe that every single event in life happens in an opportunity to choose love over fear.

quote: No work or love will flourish out of guilt, fear, or hollowness of heart, just as no valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.

quote: It's the most unhappy people who most fear change.

quote: The more you can increase fear of drugs and crime, welfare mothers, immigrants and aliens, the more you control all the people.

quote: Courageous people do not fear forgiving, for the sake of peace.

quote: People always fear change. People feared electricity when it was invented, didn't they? People feared coal, they feared gas-powered engines... There will always be ignorance, and ignorance leads to fear. But with time, people will come to accept their silicon masters.

quote: There is nothing I fear more than waking up without a program that will help me bring a little happiness to those with no resources, those who are poor, illiterate, and ridden with terminal disease.

quote: Fear is the thought of admitted inferiority.

quote: The thing we fear we bring to pass.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Fear clogs faith liberates.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
name: Plato

quote: When the tyrant has disposed of foreign enemies by conquest or treaty, and there is nothing more to fear from them, then he is always stirring up some war or other, in order that the people may require a leader.
name: Plato

quote: As we let our light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence actually liberates others.

quote: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.

quote: Fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.

quote: Do the thing you fear to do and keep on doing it... that is the quickest and surest way ever yet discovered to conquer fear.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.
name: George S. Patton

quote: Fear cannot be without hope nor hope without fear.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: If we take the generally accepted definition of bravery as a quality which knows no fear, I have never seen a brave man. All men are frightened. The more intelligent they are, the more they are frightened.
name: George S. Patton

quote: A man who is not afraid is not aggressive, a man who has no sense of fear of any kind is really a free, a peaceful man.

quote: What I needed most was to love and to be loved, eager to be caught. Happily I wrapped those painful bonds around me and sure enough, I would be lashed with the red-hot pokers or jealousy, by suspicions and fear, by burst of anger and quarrels.

quote: Writing is a form of therapy sometimes I wonder how all those who do not write, compose or paint can manage to escape the madness, melancholia, the panic and fear which is inherent in a human situation.

quote: The safest course is to do nothing against one's conscience. With this secret, we can enjoy life and have no fear from death.
name: Voltaire

quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.
name: Brian Tracy

quote: Our heavenly Father understands our disappointment, suffering, pain, fear, and doubt. He is always there to encourage our hearts and help us understand that He's sufficient for all of our needs. When I accepted this as an absolute truth in my life, I found that my worrying stopped.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: The thing you fear most has no power. Your fear of it is what has the power. Facing the truth really will set you free.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Fear of death increases in exact proportion to increase in wealth.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The people to fear are not those who disagree with you, but those who disagree with you and are too cowardly to let you know.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Injustice is censured because the censures are afraid of suffering, and not from any fear which they have of doing injustice.
name: Plato

quote: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater.
name: George Washington Carver

quote: Know one knows whether death, which people fear to be the greatest evil, may not be the greatest good.
name: Plato

quote: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: The one permanent emotion of the inferior man is fear - fear of the unknown, the complex, the inexplicable. What he wants above everything else is safety.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: The moment we begin to fear the opinions of others and hesitate to tell the truth that is in us, and from motives of policy are silent when we should speak, the divine floods of light and life no longer flow into our souls.
name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: Men are moved by two levers only: fear and self interest.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The beauty, the poetry of the fear in their eyes. I didn't mind going to jail for, what, five, six hours? It was absolutely worth it.
name: Johnny Depp

quote: You can conquer almost any fear if you will only make up your mind to do so. For remember, fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Fear not those who argue but those who dodge.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.
name: Babe Ruth

quote: God will never direct us to be prideful, arrogant and unforgiving, immoral or slothful or full of fear. We step into these things because we are insensitive to the leadership of the Holy Spirit within us.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: Don't let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. The time will pass anyway we might just as well put that passing time to the best possible use.

quote: Fear is the foundation of most governments.
name: John Adams

quote: Fear follows crime and is its punishment.
name: Voltaire

quote: Boredom is... a vital problem for the moralist, since half the sins of mankind are caused by the fear of it.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Americans are in a cycle of fear which leads to people not wanting to spend and not wanting to make investments, and that leads to more fear. We'll break out of it. It takes time.
name: Warren Buffett

quote: I more fear what is within me than what comes from without.
name: Martin Luther

quote: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder.
name: Richard Bach

quote: The strength and power of despotism consists wholly in the fear of resistance.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: Fear is the passion of slaves.
name: Patrick Henry

quote: It's an interesting combination: Having a great fear of being alone, and having a desperate need for solitude and the solitary experience. That's always been a tug of war for me.
name: Jodie Foster

quote: Puritanism. The haunting fear that someone, somewhere, may be happy.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: Whether you like it or not, you're forced to come to the realisation that death is out there. But I don't fear death, I'm a fatalist. I believe when it's your time, that's it. It's the hand you're dealt.

quote: America was not built on fear. America was built on courage, on imagination and an unbeatable determination to do the job at hand.
name: Harry S. Truman

quote: Look not mournfully into the past, it comes not back again. Wisely improve the present, it is thine. Go forth to meet the shadowy future without fear and with a manly heart.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: The greatest mistake we make is living in constant fear that we will make one.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: Fear is the main source of superstition, and one of the main sources of cruelty. To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: The Cuban people still live in constant fear of a brutal totalitarian regime that has demonstrated time and again its utter disregard for basic human dignity. The fight for a free Cuba has gone on for far too long.

quote: I was set free because my greatest fear had been realized, and I still had a daughter who I adored, and I had an old typewriter and a big idea. And so rock bottom became a solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.

quote: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.
name: Richard Bach

quote: It is almost universally felt that when we call a country democratic we are praising it consequently, the defenders of every kind of regime claim that it is a democracy, and fear that they might have to stop using the word if it were tied down to any one meaning.
name: George Orwell

name: Douglas MacArthur

quote: There is a time to take counsel of your fears, and there is a time to never listen to any fear.

quote: I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.

quote: Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.

quote: You must not fear death, my lads defy him, and you drive him into the enemy's ranks.

quote: Unless India stands up to the world, no one will respect us. In this world, fear has no place. Only strength respects strength.

quote: Loving can cost a lot but not loving always costs more, and those who fear to love often find that want of love is an emptiness that robs the joy from life.

quote: President Obama clearly cannot run on his record. All he's offering is more of the same. That's not good. Look at the economy. It's stagnating. quote: The secret of life is to have no fear it's the only way to function.

quote: Love and fear. Everything the father of a family says must inspire one or the other.

quote: While there's life, there's fear.

quote: To work without attachment is to work without the expectation of reward or fear of any punishment in this world or the next. Work so done is a means to the end, and God is the end.
name: Ramakrishna

name: Sophocles

quote: But what is all this fear of and opposition to Oblivion? What is the matter with the soft Darkness, the Dreamless Sleep?

quote: When women hold off from marrying men, we call it independence. When men hold off from marrying women, we call it fear of commitment.
name: Warren Farrell

quote: Nature soaks every evil with either fear or shame.
name: Tertullian

quote: There is greatness in the fear of God, contentment in faith of God, and honour in humility.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: My aim, then, was to whip the rebels, to humble their pride, to follow them to their inmost recesses, and make them fear and dread us. Fear is the beginning of wisdom.

name: Thomas John Watson, Sr.

quote: Love casts out fear, but we have to get over the fear in order to get close enough to love them.

quote: Grab the broom of anger and drive off the beast of fear.

quote: Boldness is a mask for fear, however great.

quote: My fear is that I go up to the girl of my dreams and say 'I'm sorry, but I've got to say hello to you,' and she slides the stool back and gets up and walks away, saying, 'Not for me, Bub. I don't want anything to do with you.'

quote: My feelings for Ellen overrode all of my fear about being out as a lesbian. I had to be with her, and I just figured I'd deal with the other stuff later.

quote: It's not necessary to fear the prospect of failure but to be determined not to fail.

quote: When desire dies, fear is born.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Fear is the dark room where the Devil develops his negatives.

quote: A propensity to hope and joy is real riches one to fear and sorrow real poverty.
name: David Hume

quote: Most men are very attached to the idea of being male, and usually experience a lot of fear and insecurity around the idea of being a man. Most women are very identified with their gender, and also experience a tremendous amount of fear and insecurity.

quote: Luck is everything... My good luck in life was to be a really frightened person. I'm fortunate to be a coward, to have a low threshold of fear, because a hero couldn't make a good suspense film.
name: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: Death is not the biggest fear we have our biggest fear is taking the risk to be alive - the risk to be alive and express what we really are.
name: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quote: The wise person often shuns society for fear of being bored.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: People are afraid, and when people are afraid, when their pie is shrinking, they look for somebody to hate. They look for somebody to blame. And a real leader speaks to anxiety and to fear and allays those fears, assuages anxiety.

quote: When you're young, you're always wondering when you're actually going to feel like a grownup. And I think you probably fear it, in a sense, too. quote: You pretend to be more eccentric than you actually are because you fear you are an interchangeable cog.

quote: How strange this fear of death is! We are never frightened at a sunset.

quote: The reason most people don't express their individuality and actually deny it, is not fear of what prime ministers think of us or the head of the federal reserve, It's what their families and their friends down at the bar are going to think of them.

quote: Good men have the fewest fears. He has but one great fear who fears to do wrong he has a thousand who has overcome it.

quote: The Russians feared Ike. They didn't fear me.

quote: I have accepted fear as a part of life - specifically the fear of change... I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says: turn back.

quote: To have a great man for an intimate friend seems pleasant to those who have never tried it those who have, fear it.
name: Homer

quote: A fear of the unknown keeps a lot of people from leaving bad situations.
name: Kathie Lee Gifford

quote: Even as we enumerate their shortcomings, the rigor of raising children ourselves makes clear to us our mothers' incredible strength. We fear both. If they are not strong, who will protect us? If they are not imperfect, how can we equal them?
name: Anna Quindlen

quote: When someone says that I'm angry it's actually a compliment. I have not always been direct with my anger in my relationships, which is part of why I'd write about it in my songs because I had such fear around expressing anger as a woman.
name: Alanis Morissette

quote: The origin of the absurd idea of immortal life is easy to discover it is kept alive by hope and fear, by childish faith, and by cowardice.
name: Clarence Darrow

quote: No one should have to choose between medicine and other necessities. No one should have to use the emergency room every time a child gets sick. And no one should have to live in constant fear that a medical problem will become a financial crisis.
name: Brad Henry

quote: Our government is founded upon the intelligence of the people. I for one do not despair of the republic. I have great confidence in the virtue of the great majority of the people, and I cannot fear the result.
name: Andrew Jackson

quote: It is wisdom in prosperity, when all is as thou wouldn't have it, to fear and suspect the worst.
name: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: I expect nothing. I fear no one. I am free.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: So the Marine Corps really did teach me to conquer fear, and then to go for higher causes, higher purposes.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Generosity during life is a very different thing from generosity in the hour of death one proceeds from genuine liberality and benevolence, the other from pride or fear.
name: Horace Mann

quote: Young players need freedom of expression to develop as creative players... they should be encouraged to try skills without fear of failure.
name: Arsene Wenger

quote: Jealousy is the fear or apprehension of superiority: envy our uneasiness under it.
name: William Shenstone

quote: I just want my family to be safe. Because I am sometimes polarizing, I fear for their safety.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: To overcome a fear, here's all you have to do: realize the fear is there, and do the action you fear anyway.

quote: To me, my biggest fear is getting a big head, and that is when I get the hammer. Because it's very easy in this game to believe you're something special.
name: Keith Richards

quote: I think we too often make choices based on the safety of cynicism, and what we're lead to is a life not fully lived. Cynicism is fear, and it's worse than fear - it's active disengagement.
name: Ken Burns

quote: A cheerful frame of mind, reinforced by relaxation... is the medicine that puts all ghosts of fear on the run.
name: George Matthew Adams

quote: When you are 16 there is no fear whatsoever. As you get older you play in more important games and that is when you start thinking about what will happen if you win or lose.

quote: Let us banish fear.
name: Carter G. Woodson

quote: Valor grows by daring, fear by holding back.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: When a match has equal partners then I fear not.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Excessive fear is always powerless.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Fear of serious injury alone cannot justify oppression of free speech and assembly. Men feared witches and burnt women. It is the function of speech to free men from the bondage of irrational fears.
name: Louis D. Brandeis

quote: Humility is a great quality of leadership which derives respect and not just fear or hatred.

quote: Dare to be honest and fear no labor.
name: Robert Burns

quote: Audacity augments courage hesitation, fear.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: I have this fear of falling in front of large groups of people. That's why I tend not to wear heels.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: No person who is enthusiastic about his work has anything to fear from life.
name: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Everyone believes very easily whatever they fear or desire.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: An important consequence of freeing oneself from the fear of death is a radical opening to spirituality of a universal and non-denominational type.
name: Stanislav Grof

quote: If you have an issue with homosexuality, then it comes to your own fear and your own darkness.

quote: I think 'Dilbert' will remain popular as long as employees are frustrated and they fear the consequences of complaining too loudly. 'Dilbert' is the designated voice of discontent for the workplace. I never planned it that way. It just happened.

quote: No society has been able to abolish human sadness, no political system can deliver us from the pain of living, from our fear of death, our thirst for the absolute. It is the human condition that directs the social condition, not vice versa.

quote: If we fear the unknown then surely we fear ourselves.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Love is the total absence of fear. Love asks no questions. Its natural state is one of extension and expansion, not comparison and measurement.
name: Gerald Jampolsky

quote: There is no such thing as perpetual tranquillity of mind while we live here because life itself is but motion, and can never be without desire, nor without fear, no more than without sense.
name: Thomas Hobbes

quote: If you can once engage people's pride, love, pity, ambition on your side, you need not fear what their reason can do against you.
name: Lord Chesterfield

quote: I fear those big words which make us so unhappy.
name: James Joyce

quote: The strongest passion is fear.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: We must laugh before we are happy, for fear we die before we laugh at all.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: The fear of burglars is not only the fear of being robbed, but also the fear of a sudden and unexpected clutch out of the darkness.

quote: I don't know how it is for women or for other guys, but when I was young and in my 20s, I had a fear of marriage.

quote: Quite a lot of our contemporary culture is actually shot through with a resentment of limits and the passage of time, anger at what we can't do, fear or even disgust at growing old.

quote: I don't have any fear of intimacy, but rather thrive on it, which is rare in a public person.
name: Jack Nicholson

quote: Monopolists who fear competition and who distrust democracy because it stands for equal opportunity would like to secure their position against small and energetic enterprise.
name: Henry A. Wallace

quote: Don't fear change - embrace it.
name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Fear prophets and those prepared to die for the truth, for as a rule they make many others die with them, often before them, at times instead of them.
name: Umberto Eco

quote: The fear of being deceived is the vulgar version of the quest for Truth.
name: Emile M. Cioran

quote: In the company of the accomplished, people hope it will rub off on themselves, in the company of the misfortunate, they fear it!

quote: Under the influence of fear, which always leads men to take a pessimistic view of things, they magnified their enemies' resources, and minimized their own.

quote: Between the fear that something would happen and the hope that still it wouldn't, there is much more space than one thinks. On that narrow, hard, bare and dark space a lot of us spend their lives.
name: Ivo Andric

quote: Do we fear terrorism so much that we throw out our Constitution, and are we unwilling and afraid to debate our Constitution?
name: Rand Paul

quote: Wit is so shining a quality that everybody admires it most people aim at it, all people fear it, and few love it unless in themselves. A man must have a good share of wit himself to endure a great share of it in another.
name: Lord Chesterfield

quote: If I have resistance to something, it means there's something wrong. The resistance to me is a sign of fear.
name: Billy Corgan

quote: Action cures fear, inaction creates terror.

quote: I have no fear of death. More important, I don't fear life.
name: Steven Seagal

quote: He has not learned the first lesson of life who does not every day surmount a fear.
name: John Dryden

quote: Within the U.S., the Obama presidency will be mainly measured by the success or failure of his economic policies. And here, I fear, the monstrous stimulus package with which this administration stumbled out of the gate will prove to be Obama's Waterloo.

quote: When we drop fear, we can draw nearer to people, we can draw nearer to the earth, we can draw nearer to all the heavenly creatures that surround us.
name: Bell Hooks

quote: My aim then was to whip the rebels, to humble their pride, to follow them to their inmost recesses, and make them fear and dread us.

quote: I've always felt that if you back down from a fear, the ghost of that fear never goes away. It diminishes people.

quote: I was probably more scared of my high school exams than I was of the Oscars. At the time you think it's everything and if you don't do well, your life's over. Opportunities are gone. So the more you do it, the less the fear is present.

quote: I am pretty fearless, and you know why? Because I don't handle fear very well I'm not a good terrified person.

quote: How does one kill fear, I wonder? How do you shoot a specter through the heart, slash off its spectral head, take it by its spectral throat?

quote: Love is a symbol of eternity. It wipes out all sense of time, destroying all memory of a beginning and all fear of an end.
name: Madame de Stael

quote: You always have two choices: your commitment versus your fear.

quote: What I fear most is power with impunity. I fear abuse of power, and the power to abuse.
name: Isabel Allende

quote: Right out of high school I never had the fear of getting beat, which is how most people lose.

quote: Crime in full glory consolidates authority by the sacred fear it inspires.
name: Emile M. Cioran

quote: Isn't history ultimately the result of our fear of boredom?
name: Emile M. Cioran

quote: The abandoned infant's cry is rage, not fear.
name: Robert Anton Wilson

quote: Fear is a disease that eats away at logic and makes man inhuman.
name: Marian Anderson

quote: It seemed that rebellion must have an unassailable base, something guarded not merely from attack, but from the fear of it: such a base as we had in the Red Sea Parts, the desert, or in the minds of the men we converted to our creed.

quote: There are few things more liberating in this life than having your worst fear realized.
name: Conan O'Brien

quote: Fear is the foundation of safety.
name: Tertullian

quote: I do not trust those who make the vaccines, or the apparatus behind it all to push it on us through fear.

quote: I believe the American people have a genuine and justifiable fear of government intrusion in what they instinctively know is going to be an ever more intrusive world.
name: Joe Biden

quote: We should face reality and our past mistakes in an honest, adult way. Boasting of glory does not make glory, and singing in the dark does not dispel fear.
name: King Hussein

quote: I have been thinking about the notion of perfect love as being without fear, and what that means for us in a world that's becoming increasingly xenophobic, tortured by fundamentalism and nationalism.
name: Bell Hooks

quote: Love, hope, fear, faith - these make humanity These are its sign and note and character.
name: Robert Browning

quote: And if the great fear had not come upon me, as it did, and forced me to do my duty, I might have been less good to the people than some man who had never dreamed at all, even with the memory of so great a vision in me.

quote: You have to be careful not to let your fear stop you doing things. It's very exciting to test yourself.
name: Francesca Annis

quote: We must laugh before we are happy, for fear of dying without having laughed at all.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: We should laugh before being happy, for fear of dying without having laughed.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Fear God and work hard.
name: David Livingstone

quote: The more I traveled the more I realized that fear makes strangers of people who should be friends.

quote: Many of us crucify ourselves between two thieves - regret for the past and fear of the future.

quote: A company is stronger if it is bound by love rather than by fear.

quote: I don't want the fear of failure to stop me from doing what I really care about.

quote: Death in itself is nothing but we fear to be we know not what, we know not where.
name: John Dryden

quote: Those who love to be feared fear to be loved.

quote: Fear cannot be banished, but it can be calm and without panic it can be mitigated by reason and evaluation.

quote: I've noticed a lot of younger artists have less fear of doing different sorts of things, whether it's various types of music, or gallery artists moving between video and sculpture and drawing.
name: David Byrne

quote: The fear of life is the favorite disease of the 20th century.
name: William Lyon Phelps

quote: There's no reason for the establishment to fear me. But it has every right to fear the people collectively - I am one with the people.

quote: It is a measure of the framers' fear that a passing majority might find it expedient to compromise 4th Amendment values that these values were embodied in the Constitution itself.

quote: 'Freedom from fear' could be said to sum up the whole philosophy of human rights.

quote: I have always been aware that you have to get people listening before you can change their minds. Any artist's big fear is being ignored, so if you get debate, that's great.

quote: I spoke without fear of contradiction. I simply did not suffer self-doubt.

quote: I've probably earned the right to screw up a few times. I don't want the fear of failure to stop me from doing what I really care about.

quote: When I have a camera in my hand, I know no fear.

quote: There is perhaps nothing so bad and so dangerous in life as fear.

quote: He who doesn't fear death dies only once.

name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I think when you move past your fear and you go after your dreams wholeheartedly, you become free.

quote: A star on a movie set is like a time bomb. That bomb has got to be defused so people can approach it without fear.
name: Jack Nicholson

quote: My whole life I've had the fear that I was going to be abandoned.
name: Halle Berry

quote: I think one of the terrible things today is that people have this deathly fear of food: fear of eggs, say, or fear of butter. Most doctors feel that you can have a little bit of everything.

quote: I won't allow myself to have tremendous fear.
name: Calvin Klein

quote: Any fear of aging, I think, is simply vanity.

quote: Mysticism and exaggeration go together. A mystic must not fear ridicule if he is to push all the way to the limits of humility or the limits of delight.

quote: I fear God and next to God I mostly fear them that fear him not.

quote: Some people need to stay at the top. They are afraid to re-start from zero because they fear the critics.
name: Eric Cantona

quote: We all have that burning question about what happens if we lose somebody we love, especially if we lose them tragically. We wonder what fear was going on, we wonder if we could have reached out and touched them, held their hand, looked in their eyes, been there.

quote: I fear no man, no beast or evil, brother.

quote: You can ask me pretty much anything. There'll be things I'll go, 'That feels a little too personal.' But most things I don't have a fear of being asked about.

quote: You cannot avoid war in life, you cannot avoid the fear of terrorism, you cannot avoid those things now, they are a part of everyday demeanor.

quote: I had a fear that I'd be typecast, but I don't really have that fear anymore.
name: David Duchovny

quote: Whenever somebody says they need an angle for their story I always fear that they've got an idea and they want me to fit into it or they want me to come up with an idea myself or I'm supposed to be more revealing than I've been, and to me it just sounds like something I don't want to do.
name: David Duchovny

quote: Fear is a very explosive emotion, but it has a short life span. It's the sprint. The marathon is hope.

quote: The record company's worst fear is that you'll fall in love or get rich.
name: Maynard James Keenan

quote: I'm very much afraid of being mad - that's my one fear.
name: Sting

quote: He who does not fear death cares naught for threats.

quote: Fundamentalists are panicked by the apparent disintegration of the family, the disappearance of certainty and the decay of morality. Fear leads them to ask, if we cannot trust the Bible, what can we trust?

name: Anne Lamott

quote: I have a big fear of change, or negative change, anyway. I'm basically the same person I was when I won 'Idol,' or when I was 10.
name: Kelly Clarkson

quote: When Christians start thinking about Jesus, things start breaking down, they lose their faith. name: A. N. Wilson

quote: I was taught that to create anything you had to believe in failure, simply because you had to be prepared to go through an idea without any fear. Failure, you learned, as I did in art school, to be a wonderful thing. It allowed you to get up in the morning and take the pillow off your head.

quote: We must travel in the direction of our fear.
name: John Berryman

quote: I have a tendency to sabotage relationships I have a tendency to sabotage everything. Fear of success, fear of failure, fear of being afraid. Useless, good-for-nothing thoughts.
name: Michael Buble

quote: Fear attracts attack.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Fear of things invisible in the natural seed of that which everyone in himself calleth religion.
name: Thomas Hobbes

quote: I try to get in quiet time and book time, but really, the only time I ever get that is when I'm on an airplane - I have a fear of flying, but I actually love flying because it's the only time I can sleep, and it's the only time I get to read.

quote: I define fear as standing across the ring from Joe Louis and knowing he wants to go home early.
name: Max Baer

quote: Business is war. I go out there, I want to kill the competitors. I want to make their lives miserable. I want to steal their market share. I want them to fear me and I want everyone on my team thinking we're going to win.
name: Kevin O'Leary

quote: Fear is not a good teacher. The lessons of fear are quickly forgotten.
name: Mary Catherine Bateson

quote: I had to confront my fears and master my every demonic thought about inferiority, insecurity, or the fear of being black, young, and gifted in this Western culture.
name: Lauryn Hill

quote: Let us go forth with fear and courage and rage to save the world.
name: Grace Paley

quote: My main concern with the condition of mathematics in high school is that there's a lot of fear involved! Math is not, generally speaking, presented in a fun way. The concepts, as I see them, are fun, and that's the way I'd like to convey them myself.
name: Danica McKellar

quote: You always fear when you're making a movie that has a moral to the story that people are going to reject the idea of being taught a lesson.
name: Christina Ricci

quote: Curiosity will conquer fear even more than bravery will.
name: James Stephens

quote: When I'm acting, I'm two beings. There's the one monitoring the distance between myself and the camera, making sure I hit my marks, and there is the one driven by this inner fire, this delicious fear.
name: Jeanne Moreau

quote: Shock, confusion, fear, anger, grief, and defiance. On Sept. 11, 2001, and for the three days following the worst terrorist attack on U.S. soil, President George W. Bush led with raw emotion that reflected the public's whipsawing stages of acceptance.
name: Ron Fournier

quote: We, the people. Manifest Destiny. Conceived in liberty. Fear itself. Ask not. Morning in America. United we stand. Yes, we can. In times of great change and tumult, presidents seek to inspire beleaguered Americans by reminding them of their national identity.
name: Ron Fournier

quote: Eighty percent of all choices are based on fear. Most people don't choose what they want they choose what they think is safe.
name: Phil McGraw

quote: Fear of error which everything recalls to me at every moment of the flight of my ideas, this mania for control, makes men prefer reason's imagination to the imagination of the senses. And yet it is always the imagination alone which is at work.
name: Louis Aragon

quote: We tell lies when we are afraid... afraid of what we don't know, afraid of what others will think, afraid of what will be found out about us. But every time we tell a lie, the thing that we fear grows stronger.
name: Tad Williams

quote: Man's loneliness is but his fear of life.
name: Eugene O'Neill

quote: I think I'm a bit less inhibited, and not thinking too much before speaking. It's not about being shameful, I'm just a bit more unabashedly myself because of this thing, and it probably started at age 15. I can be around people and say what I think without fear.
name: Kristen Stewart

quote: I may be compelled to face danger, but never fear it, and while our soldiers can stand and fight, I can stand and feed and nurse them.
name: Clara Barton

quote: When you advise any person you should be guided by the fear of God.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: God helps those who fear Him.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: Grief has limits, whereas apprehension has none. For we grieve only for what we know has happened, but we fear all that possibly may happen.
name: Pliny the Elder

quote: It's better to get mugged than to live a life of fear.
name: Freeman Dyson

quote: Dictators and oppressors should continue to fear me because I will be here for a long time.
name: Lech Walesa

quote: When the entertainers of the Right aren't declaring their disgust with President Obama for groveling before foreign potentates, they're pretending to fear him as a left-wing thug, an exemplar of what they call 'the Chicago way.'
name: Thomas Frank

quote: Jerusalem is a time bomb that I fear is just waiting to go off.
name: King Abdullah II

quote: Resist your fear fear will never lead to you a positive end. Go for your faith and what you believe.
name: T. D. Jakes

quote: When we can lay down our fear and anger and choose responses other than aggression, we create the conditions for bringing out the best in us humans.
name: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: People don't know where to place me. Terry Gilliam used me as a quirky cop in 'Twelve Monkeys', and then he hired me again to be an effeminate hotel clerk in 'Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas'. Another time, I was shooting this indie film 'The Souler Opposite' and six days a week, I'm playing this big puppy dog, then I come to the 'NYPD Blue' set and become this scumbag.
name: Christopher Meloni

quote: In this life struggle, here I am among you fully cognizant that a true believer has no fear of what God has ordained for him. Those who are visited by fear live only for their present, under the illusion that the world began with them and will end with their departure.
name: King Hussein I

quote: Uncertainty and fear and ignorance about immigrants, about people who are different, has a history as old as our Nation.
name: Luis Gutierrez

quote: But I love being scared. I think you're brave only when you do things that scare you. I've always used fear as a motivator. I'm not sure why.
name: Ginnifer Goodwin

quote: If people would know how little brain is ruling the world, they would die of fear.
name: Ivo Andric

quote: Resistance is feasible even for those who are not heroes by nature, and it is an obligation, I believe, for those who fear the consequences and detest the reality of the attempt to impose American hegemony.
name: Noam Chomsky

quote: At the time, 1980, people regarded actresses involved with production with a certain amount of fear, resentment and anger.
name: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: My dad always tell me to make decisions from love and not from fear.
name: Rashida Jones

quote: Men do weird things when they experience fear. It's like a fight-or-flight thing.
name: Rashida Jones

quote: An appeal to fear never finds an echo in German hearts.
name: Otto von Bismarck

quote: Fear is something to be moved through, not something to be turned from.
name: Peter McWilliams

quote: I write entirely to find out what I'm thinking, what I'm looking at, what I see and what it means. What I want and what I fear.
name: Joan Didion

quote: My dear brother Barack Obama has a certain fear of free black men. As a young brother who grows up in a white context, brilliant African father, he's always had to fear being a white man with black skin. All he has known culturally is white. He has a certain rootlessness, a deracination.
name: Cornel West

quote: Americans are terrified because so many of them have been laid off in recent years and months and they fear that they may be next. Even if they have not been laid off or have not known anyone laid off, they definitely know someone who has lost his home.
name: Ben Stein

quote: You can't be a proper comic unless you've been out on stage and felt the fear.
name: Johnny Vegas

quote: A huge part of what animates homophobia among young people is paranoia and fear of their own capacity to be gay themselves.
name: Dan Savage

quote: Without fullness of experience, length of days is nothing. When fullness of life has been achieved, shortness of days is nothing. That is perhaps why the young have usually so little fear of death they live by intensities that the elderly have forgotten.
name: Lewis Mumford

quote: In the ring, I never really knew fear.
name: Rocky Marciano

quote: Can someone within that society walk into the town square and say what they want without fear of being punished for his or her views? If so, then that society is a free society. If not, it is a fear society.
name: Natan Sharansky

quote: There's always a period of curious fear between the first sweet-smelling breeze and the time when the rain comes cracking down.
name: Don DeLillo

quote: I do support artists standing by their beliefs and walking with integrity. We have to find a better way to commercially exploit music while giving artists their proper respect. name: Lauryn Hill

name: Mitch Daniels

quote: The vehemence with which certain critics have chosen not simply to criticize what I've written, but to challenge my writing this story at all, speaks of what the book is about: fear of disapproval.
name: Joyce Maynard

quote: I say let's go back to a truer use of the word 'freedom.' name: Richard Trumka

quote: When we are unwilling to draw clear moral lines between free societies and fear societies, when we are unwilling to call the former good and the latter evil, we will not be able to advance the cause of peace because peace cannot be disconnected from freedom.
name: Natan Sharansky

quote: You know that day after day of, Oh God what am I going to do with myself feeling? The fear of the emptiness that it implies keeps me going.

quote: I find fear is a great motivator to work hard.

quote: They did interviews with my wife and daughter-they were genuinely in fear of me having a heart attack, working 20 hours a day, eating fast food.

quote: There was a real fear that a euro-zone bank might fail, that we'd have a sovereign debt problem in one of the larger European economies. That's dissipated, thanks largely to the action of the European Central Bank.
name: George Osborne

quote: We poison our lives with fear of burglary and shipwreck, and, ask anyone, the house is never burgled, and the ship never goes down.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: When men don't fear God, they give themselves to evil.

quote: I cannot give a single concert at which I do not play one piece after the other in an agony of terror because my memory threatens to fail me. This fear torments me for days beforehand.
name: Clara Schumann

quote: Worry does not mean fear, but readiness for the confrontation.

quote: Hope thou not much, and fear thou not at all.

quote: We must have our say, not through violence, aggression or fear. We must speak out calmly and forcefully. We shall only be able to enter the new world era if we agree to engage in dialogue with the other side.

name: Mary McCarthy

quote: As one who participated in all the wars of the state of Israel, I saw the horror of wars. I saw the fear of wars. I saw my best friends being killed in battles. I was seriously injured twice.

quote: The world has nothing to fear from military ambition in our Government.
name: James K. Polk

quote: I fear other actors who are not prepared. And I fear directors who are afraid.
name: Tommy Lee Jones

quote: I don't think that anyone seriously fears that the world can be blown to pieces all together. But what one can fear and rightly so are regional things, like in the Middle East, India, Pakistan, the Korean Peninsula, borders in Africa, etc.
name: Hans Blix

name: Daniel H. Wilson

quote: Part of what Special Olympics is trying to do is break down stereotypes that still exist for people. There is still a lot of fear.
name: Maria Shriver

quote: The fear of the never-ending onslaught of gizmos and gadgets is nothing new. The radio, the telephone, Facebook - each of these inventions changed the world. Each of them scared the heck out of an older generation. And each of them was invented by people who were in their 20s.

quote: I have a fear of poverty in old age. I have this vision of myself living in a skip and eating cat food. It's because I'm freelance, and I've never had a proper job. I don't have a pension, and my savings are dwindling. I always thought someone would just come along and look after me.

quote: Let children read whatever they want and then talk about it with them. If parents and kids can talk together, we won't have as much censorship because we won't have as much fear.

quote: The books that will never be read. And all due to the fear of censorship. As always, young readers will be the real losers.
name: Judy Blume

quote: There's so much fear involved in trying to do something you don't know how to do that drugs and alcohol can become a big part of your life if you have an addictive personality or are very unsure, which most songwriters are.
name: Barry Mann

quote: The things you fear are undefeatable, not by their nature, but by your approach.
name: Jewel

quote: I live in constant fear of being fired or dropped for that dark part of my work I can't control.
name: Lynda Barry

quote: The fear for a network is the viewer gets tired of you. Not that you lost any credibility, but they get tired of you.

quote: But with the right kind of coaching and determination you can accomplish anything and the biggest accomplishment that I feel I got from the film was overcoming that fear.

quote: We've all had that fear, that despair of losing someone, or this fierce desire because it's not reciprocated. The less reciprocation there is, the more desire we have.

quote: I won't touch on risky, because that's subjective. People are just afraid of things too much. Afraid of things that don't necessarily merit fear.

quote: He who has conquered doubt and fear has conquered failure.
name: James Lane Allen

quote: I'm not the type of person to live in fear. I think positively.

quote: Sides are being divided now. It's very obvious. So if you're on the other side of the fence, you're suddenly anti-American. It's breeding fear of being on the wrong side.

quote: Part of the reason that the government's fear mongering is succeeding is because so many people are so ignorant, that it is easier for government to frighten people in submission.

quote: Action conquers fear.

quote: There is a fear of emotion in tennis.

quote: In masks outrageous and austere, The years go by in single file But none has merited my fear, And none has quite escaped my smile.

quote: My biggest fear in life is to be average.

quote: When you say 'fear of the unknown', that is the definition of fear fear is the unknown, fear is what you do not know, and it's genetically within us so that we feel safe. We feel scared of the woods because we're not familiar with it, and that keeps you safe.

quote: There's always an element of fear that you need to work a lot until people get sick and tired of you or finally figure out that you're a fraud after all!

quote: By action and reaction do we become strong or weak, according to the character of our thoughts and mental states. Fear is the deadly nightshade of the mind.

quote: China, in the future, is going to have even more nuclear capability than it has had in the past. I don't believe that they have anything to fear from the United States, and I frankly don't believe they do fear the United States.

quote: We will be safer from terrorist attack only when we have earned the respect of all other nations instead of their fear, respect for our values and not merely our weapons.

quote: Are you gonna fuel your faith or fuel your fear? I'm all about fueling my faith, especially when it's hard to do so.

quote: Being aware of your fear is smart. Overcoming it is the mark of a successful person.

quote: We fear doing too little when we should do more. Then atone by doing too much, when perhaps we should do less.
name: Robert Trout

quote: Loneliness is, I think, people's biggest fear, whether they are conscious of it or not.

quote: When, as we must often do, we fear science, we really fear ourselves.

quote: I have no fear of photography as long as it cannot be used in heaven and in hell.

name: Amy Tan

quote: I know a lot of people fear the rougher types who might be at a state school, but surely it is better to know who they are and how to deal with them than for that kind of child to appear as a completely different species to yours.

quote: Fools rush in where incumbents fear to tread.

quote: Celebrity or no celebrity, I think a lot of females deal with the fear of being abducted.
name: Elisha Cuthbert

quote: With Alexander's cancer, I was definitely brought to my knees for the first time because of the fear factor.

quote: How are fears born? They are born because of differences in tradition and history they are born because of differences in emotional, political and national circumstances. Because of such differences, people fear they cannot live together.

quote: Some days it is a heroic act just to refuse the paralysis of fear and straighten up and step into another day.

quote: Don't fear the terrorists. They're mothers and fathers.
name: Rosie O'Donnell

quote: Do what you fear most and you control fear.

name: Matthew Fox

quote: The roots of homophobia are fear. Fear and more fear.
name: George Weinberg

quote: I remember looking at the sky and thinking that the universe is so big and it's all chaos. I call it 'the dark fear.' At any moment, the dark fear could come in.
name: St. Vincent

quote: There is no city or country in the world where women and girls live free of the fear of violence. No leader can claim: 'this is not happening in my backyard.'

quote: Most fears are basic: fear of the dark, fear of going down in the basement, fear of weird sounds, fear that somebody is waiting for you in your closet. Those kinds of things stay with you no matter what age.

quote: 'Truth Will Set U Free' is about honesty. My philosophic belief that ultimately being true to yourself is liberating, with every individual's inalienable right to be who they are without fear or recrimination.
name: Corey Hart

quote: Fear is the enemy. I distrust it. Any feeling or decision I make that might be motivated by fear I quickly reassess.

quote: My greatest fear: repetition.
name: Max Frisch

quote: The key to change... is to let go of fear.
name: Rosanne Cash

quote: What they smell isn't the emotion of fear. What dogs can smell is the changes in a person's skin that suggest fear to the dog, anxiety, the way your skin sweats, the amount of uric acid that suddenly pours out of your pores.

quote: It comes with faith, for with complete faith there is no fear of what faces you in life or death.
name: Jacqueline Cochran

quote: I remember being onstage once when I didn't have fear: I got so scared I didn't have fear that it brought on an anxiety attack.
name: Carly Simon

quote: My optimism is not based primarily on the successful march of democracy in recent times but rather is based on the experience of having lived in a fear society and studied the mechanics of tyranny that sustain such a society.
name: Natan Sharansky

quote: In contrast, fear societies are societies in which dissent is banned.
name: Natan Sharansky

quote: People may believe that there can be a society where dissent is not permitted, but which is nonetheless not a fear society because everyone agrees with one another and therefore no one wants to dissent.
name: Natan Sharansky

quote: Will dissent be permitted? The answer to that question will determine whether the society is a free society or a fear society.
name: Natan Sharansky

quote: Amin knew that neither West nor East would criticize him for fear that he would support the other side. He felt he was untouchable and he said so openly.

quote: I have no doubt that given a real choice, the vast majority of Muslims and Arabs, like everyone else will choose a free society over a fear society.

quote: I'm always interested in trying to investigate different personalities. I want to keep myself guessing and keep the fear element alive, so that I don't get too comfortable.

name: Natan Sharansky

quote: I fear it's because religion is man's attempt to reach God, and when he feels he has succeeded, he cannot abide anyone else's claim to have done the same.
name: Jerry B. Jenkins

quote: There is no fear before and no fear after. We give our best.
name: Rickie Lee Jones

quote: People feel uncomfortable talking about racial issues out of fear that if they express things, they will be characterized in a way that's not fair. I think that there is still a need for a dialogue about things racial that we've not engaged in.
name: Eric Holder

quote: One of the most gratifying things I get as an artist is when people watch me do these different demonstrations, and they in some way feel empowered by what I'm doing so they can confront their own fears. name: Criss Angel

quote: I approach my character with the question: What would an animal think? How would an animal respond? A lot of times, it's quick action and no fear, and sometimes it's irrational fear. You don't always know.

quote: I think that the problem is that people fear so many things and they don't live life to its fullest. And for me as an artist, if God should want me to come this Wednesday to the end of my life, so be it.
name: Criss Angel

quote: You can't be afraid to put out a fire if you're a fireman. You can't be afraid to be a police officer and carry a gun if you're afraid to get up and go out there. So you've got to put that fear to the side and go out in faith to overcome that.
name: Duane Chapman

quote: Of all the hazards, fear is the worst.
name: Sam Snead

quote: I don't buy into any of that hogwash. They put that out to sell tickets. It's just a classic horror movie, with the Greek drama formula of good versus evil, and lots of fear.
name: Margot Kidder

quote: When you gain 50 pounds during pregnancy like I did, you fear that you'll never get back in shape.

quote: I have a ridiculous fear of sharks but I'd jump in the water in a second for an amazing role.

quote: As an actor, to have achieved financial stability is amazing. But I always have this weird fear that I'm not going to get any more work it's about not having enough money.

quote: Maybe I fear things going wrong so much that I pre-empt them by not getting excited about them when they appear to be. going well.

quote: What I think we fear is rapid, pronounced, and uncontrollable changes to ourselves, and because of this we have a form of personality inertia - something that resists rapid change.
name: Simon Travaglia

name: K. D. Lang

quote: Greatness comes from fear. Fear can either shut us down and we go home, or we fight through it.

name: John B. S. Haldane

quote: Don't fear anything for your letters, they are burnt one by one and I hope you do the same with mine.
name: Camille Claudel

quote: I think interviews can be fine. It's just there's this terrible fear of coming off wrongly or saying something that gets taken out of context.

quote: You don't have to do everything by the time you're 30. Or 40. All you need is a work ethic. It's what allows you to push through moments of disappointment and self-doubt and fear.

quote: There's no love more intense than the love we have for our kids - and where there is intense love, there is also intense fear lurking beneath the surface.
name: Arianna Huffington
